attributes.action: Dont let The FA fine the hero that Is Wayne Shaw, all the man did was eat a pie!
attributes.additional_details: The Sun newspaper have placed Wayne Shaw into a position where he would breach the FA rules whether he ate the pie or not. And lets be honest, we all love a pie!
attributes.background: Wayne Shaw, the 20stone goalkeeper for Sutton has recently lost his job at Sutton United. As the government are a supporter of sporting hero's and the sale of pies (pasty tax), then they should stop the FA from fining or suspending Wayne Shaw.
